Key Arguments: The legislation targets only digital platforms and not all media outlets or politicians, who are also capable of spreading misinformation.
Mainstream media and government narratives have been misleading, particularly regarding COVID-19 vaccines, causing harm to individuals.
The legislation could stifle free speech and open discussion on digital platforms due to fear of fines.
The bill contradicts democratic principles by potentially silencing dissenting opinions.
Main Themes: Criticism of government and mainstream media narratives
Concerns about censorship and stifling of debate
Notable Quotes: FREE SPEECH IS THE CORNERSTONE OF ANY DEMOCRATIC SOCIETY.
There is no way that a Legislation such as this should be passed in what is proclaimed to be a democracy.
It seems strange that while there is such a push for a ‘Voice to Parliament’ for the Indigenous Community, another section of the community are losing theirs!
